name: The Heart In Space v1.01
description:
In the year 2415, human civilization has progressed to the point where they have begun to meticulously map the corners of the universe. While performing this arduous task, many discoveries have been made, ranging from the exquisite to the grotesque, yet through it all the Blue Star Federation, the military arm of humanity, has been able to push forward through the hardships, loss, and sorrow to acquire new resources and allies for the good of all mankind. Despite this though, there are those who would attempt to circumvent the peace brought by the B.S.F., thus new weapons have been created to protect the galaxy.

One such weapon is named D-01-N, a living bioweapon created the esteemed Doctor Clara.

This is his story.

- - - - - - -

v. 1.01 - Fixed Dei being unable to move past Dee in the underwater base.
